result.arabic_text: يَقۡدُمُ قَوۡمَهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فَأَوۡرَدَهُمُ ٱلنَّارَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡوِرۡدُ ٱلۡمَوۡرُودُ
result.translation: 98. Qhiyaamah ayró firqawni isi mara miraacisaah foocat keenik gexa jahannam girá ken arkissiiy tet ken culussu haam fanah, maxxu qaxuma culsiyyaay usuk jahannam girá ken kah çulsam.
